data.lyric:
[ti:21 (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]21 (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:01.89]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Khaled Rohaim/Keanu Dean Torres
[00:06.15]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Khaled Rohaim/Keanu Dean Torres
[00:10.40]Decorate your block with red tape foenem slidin' every day
[00:13.27]Bunch of hollows spittin' out the Glock
[00:15.61]I been servin' fiends all day out there posted with the gang
[00:18.80]N***a we was taught to get it off the block
[00:20.81]It's a hundred bands in the safe now I got expensive taste
[00:24.20]Mike Amiri jeans fill 'em up with knots
[00:26.51]I been on my grind every day don't believe in takin' breaks
[00:29.69]I ain't stoppin' 'til we chillin' at the top
[00:31.68]Swervin' on the E-way don't care if I crash in this coupe
[00:34.50]S**t I'm thinkin' 'bout too real might lose my mind in this coupe
[00:37.23]Can't relapse off these d**gs man R I P to Juice
[00:39.97]We was tweakin' off them Percs I popped my last one with you
[00:42.55]Bond tight with my day ones ain't tryna find no recruits
[00:45.13]We was playin' give and take on that front line with my troops
[00:48.03]
[00:48.60]Ayy like who want smoke We got plenty guns
[00:51.24]Keep two lil' savages on X and they gon' get it done
[00:54.06]And them hollow tips do surgery they gon' clip his lungs
[00:56.73]It was goin' down on the set that's when this s**t was fun
[00:59.43]I just been ballin' on these n***as like I'm Kendrick Nunn
[01:02.09]Every day my birthday b***h it's lit I just turned twenty-one
[01:04.11]
[01:04.73]Decorate your block with red tape foenem slidin' every day
[01:07.84]Bunch of hollows spittin' out the Glock
[01:10.16]I been servin' fiends all day out there posted with the gang
[01:13.35]N***a we was taught to get it off the block
[01:15.61]It's a hundred bands in the safe now I got expensive taste
[01:18.75]Mike Amiri jeans fill 'em up with knots
[01:21.06]I been on my grind every day don't believe in takin' breaks
[01:24.22]I ain't stoppin' 'til we chillin' at the top
[01:26.07]
[01:26.64]Ever since I stepped up in this game I've been a bomb threat
[01:29.30]I was in the trenches tryna see a life beyond that
[01:31.99]'Cause complacent n***as usually die up in they complex
[01:34.76]N***a where I'm from they turn death into a contest
[01:37.47]Livin' by the gun put all my trust into this compact
[01:40.05]My n***as went to war but they ain't get no Vietnam check
[01:42.92]Lil' bro want his head he tryna make his brains ooze
[01:45.48]Lil' b***h I'm from the Northside where they raise goons
[01:48.17]Took losses in these streets s**t got me singin' gang blues
[01:50.91]I been a real n***a 'fore this s**t became cool
[01:53.46]I'm the type to switch my watch up every time I change moods
[01:56.25]He the type to get excited 'cause he made The Shade Room
[01:59.28]Decorate your block with red tape foenem slidin' every day
[02:02.39]Bunch of hollows spittin' out the Glock
[02:04.70]I been servin' fiends all day out there posted with the gang
[02:07.91]N***a we was taught to get it off the block
[02:10.16]It's a hundred bands in the safe now I got expensive taste
[02:13.29]Mike Amiri jeans fill 'em up with knots
[02:15.62]I been on my grind every day don't believe in takin' breaks
[02:18.76]I ain't stoppin' 'til we chillin' at the top
data.trans:
[ti:21 (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.89]//
[00:06.15]//
[00:10.40]在你的街区胡作非为 我每天带着兄弟招摇过市
[00:13.27]扣动扳机 几发子弹从枪口射出
[00:15.61]我过着刀口舔血的日子 和兄弟们一起四处闯荡
[00:18.80]有人劝我们及时收手
[00:20.81]我的保险箱里塞满钞票 如今我喜欢价值连城的东西
[00:24.20]Mike Amiri牛仔裤兜里塞满钞票
[00:26.51]我每天都埋头苦干 别相信我会休息
[00:29.69]在我们屹立巅峰以前 我绝不停下脚步
[00:31.68]我在高速路上突然转弯 就算把车撞坏也没关系
[00:34.50]我胡思乱想 我可能会在车里失去理智
[00:37.23]我对这些**欲罢不能 哥们 愿Juice安息
[00:39.97]我们一起努力 不再去碰那些药片 我最后一次与你放纵自己
[00:42.55]我和兄弟团结一致 我不想认识新朋友
[00:45.13]我带着兄弟深入龙潭虎穴 一手交钱一手交货
[00:48.03]
[00:48.60]谁不要命 我们让他吃枪子
[00:51.24]给他们壮壮胆子 他们一定能完成任务
[00:54.06]把他打倒落花流水 他们得做手术把子弹从肺里取出来
[00:56.73]按照计划进行 这是最有趣的地方
[00:59.43]我疯狂捞金 仿佛我是Kendrick Nunn
[01:02.09]每天都像是我的生日 我引发轰动 我才刚满21岁
[01:04.11]
[01:04.73]在你的街区胡作非为 我每天带着兄弟招摇过市
[01:07.84]扣动扳机 几发子弹从枪口射出
[01:10.16]我过着刀口舔血的日子 和兄弟们一起四处闯荡
[01:13.35]有人劝我们及时收手
[01:15.61]我的保险箱里塞满钞票 如今我喜欢价值连城的东西
[01:18.75]Mike Amiri牛仔裤兜里塞满钞票
[01:21.06]我每天都埋头苦干 别相信我会休息
[01:24.22]在我们屹立巅峰以前 我绝不停下脚步
[01:26.07]
[01:26.64]自从我进入这个圈子 我威胁着大多数人的事业
[01:29.30]我以前艰难求生 我想看看有钱人的生活是什么样的
[01:31.99]因为沾沾自喜的家伙通常在五味杂陈里死去
[01:34.76]哥们 在我的家乡 他们把死亡变成一场竞赛游戏
[01:37.47]拿着枪保护自己 我的性命就寄托于此
[01:40.05]把我的兄弟送上战场 可他们拿不到好处
[01:42.92]小弟弟想要他的命 他想打爆他的头
[01:45.48]我来自北方 那里是地痞流氓的乐土
[01:48.17]在街头一败涂地 我唱着悲伤的歌
[01:50.91]我只顶天立地的男子汉 绝不动摇分毫
[01:53.46]我是那个看心情好坏更换手表的人
[01:56.25]他是那种到处散布流言蜚语还暗自窃喜的人
[01:59.28]在你的街区胡作非为 我每天带着兄弟招摇过市
[02:02.39]扣动扳机 几发子弹从枪口射出
[02:04.70]我过着刀口舔血的日子 和兄弟们一起四处闯荡
[02:07.91]有人劝我们及时收手
[02:10.16]我的保险箱里塞满钞票 如今我喜欢价值连城的东西
[02:13.29]Mike Amiri牛仔裤兜里塞满钞票
[02:15.62]我每天都埋头苦干 别相信我会休息
[02:18.76]在我们屹立巅峰以前 我绝不停下脚步
